wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Joseph Walton (died 1808) was Master Gunner, St James's Park, the most senior Ceremonial Post in the Royal Artillery after the Sovereign.

response: *Joseph Walton (footballer) (1868–1940), English association footballer of the 1890s
*Joseph Walton (convict) (1830–?), convict transported to Western Australia
*Sir Joseph Walton, 1st Baronet (1849–1923), Liberal Party MP for Barnsley, 1897–1922
*Joseph Walton (British Army officer) (died 1808), Master Gunner, St. James's Park
